Text: Trikala 2000 B.C. (alternate spelling: Trikalla), full name, Athlitikos Syllogos Trikala 2000 Basketball Club, was a Greek professional basketball club located in Trikala, Greece.

Text: Trikala 2000 B.C.: The club was commonly known as either Trikala B.C., or Trikala 2000.

<Text: Trikala 2000 B.C.:  Trikala competed in the Greek League, the top tier of Greek basketball.>
